games.title: Monster Survivors - Roguelike Action
games.description: Survive endless waves of monsters in this action-packed roguelike survival game! Choose from multiple characters, each with unique abilities and starting weapons. Level up your character, evolve weapons, and face increasingly difficult boss battles. Inspired by Vampire Survivors, this game combines fast-paced action with strategic character building. How long can you survive as the monsters get stronger?
games.shortDesc: Survive endless monster waves in this roguelike action game
games.controls: 使用WASD或方向键移动角色，自动攻击怪物，升级时选择武器和技能
games.tips: 选择合适的武器组合，优先升级血量和移动速度，注意boss出现时间

games.title: 2048 Game - Number Puzzle
games.description: Play the addictive 2048 number puzzle game online for free! Combine tiles with the same numbers to reach 2048. This classic math puzzle game challenges your strategic thinking and planning skills. Swipe to move tiles and combine identical numbers to create larger ones. Can you reach the elusive 2048 tile?
games.shortDesc: Combine numbers to reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle game
games.controls: 使用方向键或滑动屏幕来移动数字方块
games.tips: 规划移动路线，保持最大数字在角落，避免随意移动造成死局

games.title: Bubble Shooter Classic Free
games.description: Aim and shoot colorful bubbles in this addictive classic game! Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to make them pop and clear the board. Use strategy to create chain reactions and earn bonus points. Features over 100 challenging levels with increasing difficulty and special power-ups.
games.shortDesc: Aim and match colorful bubbles in this classic arcade game
games.controls: 鼠标瞄准并点击发射泡泡，匹配3个或更多相同颜色
games.tips: 瞄准准确，利用反弹角度，优先消除上层泡泡制造连锁反应

games.title: Endless Runner Games 3D
games.description: Run as far as you can in this exciting endless runner game! Jump over obstacles, collect coins, and power-ups while running through colorful 3D environments. Features smooth gameplay, multiple characters to unlock, and weekly leaderboard challenges. Perfect for quick gaming sessions!
games.shortDesc: Run endlessly through 3D environments, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins
games.controls: 左右键转向，上键跳跃，下键滑铲，空格键使用道具
games.tips: 提前预判障碍物，收集金币购买角色和道具，保持节奏感

games.title: Car Racing Games Unblocked
games.description: Race high-speed cars on various tracks around the world! Features realistic physics, multiple car classes, and competitive AI opponents. Customize your vehicles with upgrades and paint jobs. Master different racing disciplines from street racing to formula competitions.
games.shortDesc: Race high-speed cars on tracks worldwide with realistic physics
games.controls: 方向键或WASD控制赛车，空格键手刹，Shift键氮气加速
games.tips: 掌握过弯技巧，合理使用氮气加速，熟悉赛道布局抢占先机

games.title: Racing Games Split Screen
games.description: Race against your friend in split-screen multiplayer racing! Choose from various high-performance cars and compete on exciting tracks. Features local 2-player mode, multiple racing disciplines, and car customization options. Perfect for competitive racing with friends.
games.shortDesc: Split-screen racing competition with friends and fast cars
games.controls: 玩家1: WASD控制，玩家2: 方向键控制，空格键刹车
games.tips: 熟悉赛道弯道，合理使用漂移过弯，卡位阻挡对手超车

games.title: 2048 Legacy - Number Puzzle
games.description: Play the enhanced 2048 number puzzle game with smooth animations and improved graphics! Combine identical numbered tiles to reach 2048. Features multiple difficulty levels, score tracking, and beautiful visual effects. Can you master this addictive math puzzle?
games.shortDesc: Play the enhanced 2048 number puzzle game with smooth animations and improved graphics! Combine identical numbered tiles to reach 2048.
games.controls: Follow on-screen instructions or use keyboard/mouse controls

games.title: Snake Adventure - Classic Arcade
games.description: Experience the classic Snake game with modern twists! Guide your snake to collect food and grow longer while avoiding obstacles. Features power-ups, multiple game modes, and enhanced graphics for the ultimate retro arcade experience.
games.shortDesc: Experience the classic Snake game with modern twists! Guide your snake to collect food and grow longer while avoiding obstacles.

games.title: Tic Tac Toe Pro - Strategy Game
games.description: Play the classic Tic Tac Toe game with enhanced features! Enjoy single-player vs AI or local multiplayer modes. Features different difficulty levels, score tracking, and beautiful animations. Perfect for quick strategy gaming sessions.

games.title: Car Racing 3D
games.description: Experience fast-paced 3D car racing with realistic physics and multiple exciting tracks! Race through challenging circuits with dynamic weather conditions, compete against AI opponents, and master different racing disciplines. Features customizable vehicles, upgrade systems, and competitive leaderboards. Perfect for racing enthusiasts who love high-speed action and realistic driving mechanics.
games.shortDesc: Fast-paced 3D car racing with realistic physics and multiple tracks
games.controls: 方向键或WASD移动，鼠标点击操作，空格键特殊技能

games.title: Soccer Physics
games.description: Enjoy this hilarious physics-based soccer game with quirky controls and unpredictable gameplay! Experience realistic ball physics, unique character movements, and challenging matches that will test your skills. Features multiple game modes, local multiplayer support, and entertaining animations. Perfect for casual gaming sessions with friends and family.
games.shortDesc: Hilarious physics-based soccer game with quirky controls
games.controls: 方向键控制移动，空格键跳跃/踢球，鼠标瞄准
games.tips: 掌握时机很重要，练习精准操作，观察对手动向

games.title: Stick War Legacy
games.description: Command your stick figure army in this strategic warfare game featuring comprehensive army management and tactical combat! Build your forces, research new technologies, and conquer enemy territories through strategic planning and resource management. Features multiple unit types, upgrade systems, and challenging campaign missions that test your strategic thinking.
games.shortDesc: Strategic warfare game with stick figures and army management
games.controls: 鼠标点击选择单位，拖拽移动，右键取消操作
games.tips: 合理分配资源，建立防御体系，适时进攻

games.title: Fruit Ninja HTML5
games.description: Slice flying fruits with precision in this addictive arcade game that tests your reflexes and accuracy! Features smooth touch controls, explosive fruit combinations, and challenging bonus levels. Avoid bombs, create massive combos, and achieve high scores in this fast-paced fruit-slicing adventure perfect for quick gaming sessions.
games.shortDesc: Slice fruits with your finger in this addictive arcade game
games.controls: 方向键移动，空格键跳跃，鼠标点击交互
games.tips: 熟练掌握操作，记住关卡模式，收集道具增强能力

games.title: Tower Defense HTML5
games.description: Defend your base against waves of enemies with strategic tower placement and comprehensive upgrade systems! Features multiple tower types, challenging enemy varieties, and progressive difficulty levels. Plan your defense strategy, manage resources efficiently, and survive endless waves of increasingly powerful opponents in this classic tower defense experience.
games.shortDesc: Defend your base with strategic tower placement and upgrades
games.controls: 鼠标点击选择单位，拖拽移动，右键取消操作

games.title: Buckshot Roulette
games.description: Do you dare to bet your life on an exciting roulette wheel showdown? Buckshot Roulette is a gun simulator that combines strategy, shooting and survival. Instead of a pistol, a powerful shotgun was used. Every pull of the trigger is a choice of fate. The winner lives, the loser dies. You will begin a Turn-Based shooting roulette game. Each round will have a fixed number of bullets and blanks.
games.shortDesc: Do you dare to bet your life on an exciting roulette wheel showdown? Buckshot Roulette is a gun simulator that combines strategy, shooting and survival.
games.controls: Mouse click or tap to play
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: Catch The Goose
games.description: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game. Players can tap identical items to automatically send them to the bottom slot - when three matching items gather, they get eliminated. Successfully clear all items to catch a mischievous goose.
games.shortDesc: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game.
games.controls: Follow on-screen instructions or use keyboard/mouse controls

games.title: Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts
games.description: Play Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts, a free and addictive sorting game! Train your brain by stacking nuts of the same color. Simple yet challenging, it's the perfect casual game to relax and sharpen your logic skills.

games.title: DayCare Tycoon
games.description: Are you ready to build your dream business empire and be a great babysitter in this money tycoon simulator? Dive into the world of daycare games and experience the joy of managing your own thriving idle tycoon games. From welcoming adorable babies to creating a safe and happy environment, this game offers everything you need to grow your daycare business into a successful venture.
games.shortDesc: Are you ready to build your dream business empire and be a great babysitter in this money tycoon simulator? Dive into the world of daycare games and experience the joy of managing your own thriving idle tycoon games.

games.title: Stickman Gun Shooter
games.description: Get ready to dive into a unique shooting experience with Stickman Gun Shooter! Enjoy an experience that invites you to take control of an expert shooter as you use a spinning gun to defeat fun Stickmans. The game combines realistic ragdoll physics with exciting and simple gameplay - your goal will be to destroy the yellow Stickmans that get in your way, overcoming different levels with different challenges and obstacles, while demonstrating your sniper skills!
games.shortDesc: Get ready to dive into a unique shooting experience with Stickman Gun Shooter! Enjoy an experience that invites you to take control of an expert shooter as you use a spinning gun to defeat fun Stickmans.
games.controls: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Shooter Physics; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels, Use the mouse or touch to play
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: Spider Solitaire
games.description: Challenge yourself with this captivating solitaire inspired by the classic Spider card game! Arrange all the cards on the table into complete sequences of the same suit (from King to Ace), testing your logic, strategy, and patience. Choose your difficulty level, play with one, two, or all four suits, and prove your skills with the deck. Every move counts—can you complete all the sequences before running out of options?
games.shortDesc: Challenge yourself with this captivating solitaire inspired by the classic Spider card game! Arrange all the cards on the table into complete sequences of the same suit (from King to Ace), testing your logic, strategy, and patience.
games.controls: The goal is to complete descending sequences of the same suit, from King to Ace. You can move cards or stacks in descending order, even if they are of different suits. Once a complete sequence of the same suit is formed, it will be removed from the table. If no moves are available, deal new cards by tapping the deck at the top. Choose your difficulty: - Easy: 1 suit - Medium: 2 suits - Hard: 4 suits Complete all sequences to win the game!
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: Horror Playtime Room Escape
games.description: Challenge your brain to break through the fog of horror. Enter a mysterious story where you're trapped in horrible rooms full of puzzles. Use your brain to solve hidden things and uncover the truth of horror stories.
games.shortDesc: Challenge your brain to break through the fog of horror.
games.controls: Follow on-screen instructions or use keyboard/mouse controls
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: NSR Street Car Racing
games.description: Hit the Streets & Dominate the Race! Jump into heart-pounding street racing action! Customize powerful cars, master drifts, unleash nitro boosts, and challenge real players in multiplayer races and intense 1v1 duels. Become a street-racing legend! Ready, Set, Drift!
games.shortDesc: Hit the Streets & Dominate the Race! Jump into heart-pounding street racing action! Customize powerful cars, master drifts, unleash nitro boosts, and challenge real players in multiplayer races and intense 1v1 duels.
games.controls: Game Controls: • Steer: Use A/D or Left/Right Arrow keys to steer. • Accelerate: Hold W or Up Arrow to speed up. • Brake/Reverse: Press S or Down Arrow to brake or reverse. • Drift: Tap and hold Spacebar for stylish drifting around corners. • Nitro Boost: Press Shift for an explosive burst of speed! Get behind the wheel and dominate the streets!
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: Save the Daddy
games.description: Get ready to unlock a world of tricky puzzles and brain teasers in Save the Daddy. Pull the pin in the right order and help the man escape from dangerous monsters & obstacles safely and thoughtfully.
games.shortDesc: Get ready to unlock a world of tricky puzzles and brain teasers in Save the Daddy.
games.controls: Follow on-screen instructions or use keyboard/mouse controls

games.title: Geometry Arrow 2
games.description: Geometry Arrow 2 is the fast-paced sequel to the original rhythm arcade hit! Navigate through 6 dynamic levels, dodging obstacles that move to the beat. Switch between the Arrow and the all-new Wheel character, each with unique mechanics. Unlock achievements and customize your Arrow and Wheel with different skins, particles, and block textures. Time your moves, feel the rhythm, and reach the portal in perfect sync!
games.shortDesc: Geometry Arrow 2 is the fast-paced sequel to the original rhythm arcade hit! Navigate through 6 dynamic levels, dodging obstacles that move to the beat.
games.controls: Goal: Reach the portal without crashing into obstacles. How to play: Select any of the 6 levels from the main menu. Tap/click at the right moment to dodge obstacles in sync with the music. Each level includes both Arrow and Wheel segments. Controls: PC Press SPACEBAR or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to move or jump. Press ESC to exit the level. Mobile Tap the screen to move or jump in rhythm. Quick reactions and precise timing are key to success!
games.tips: Read the game instructions before starting for better gameplay experience

games.title: Draw Climber
games.description: Funniest race you ever played! Draw your legs to win the race! Any drawing will make you run! When you are stuck you can draw another shape to pass!
games.shortDesc: Funniest race you ever played! Draw your legs to win the race! Any drawing will make you run! When y...
games.controls: Draw your legs to win the race!

games.title: Grass Land
games.description: Grass Land is a vibrant exploration game that drops you into a sprawling world of thick greenery and hidden surprises. Take control of your grass cutter, uncover valuable resources beneath the overgrowth, and build up your base as you roam the fields. Stay sharp, move fast, and make the most of every patch of grass you find.
games.shortDesc: Grass Land is a vibrant exploration game that drops you into a sprawling world of thick greenery and hidden surprises.
games.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / joystick to control the character.

games.title: ASMR Beauty Superstar
games.description: Welcome to ASMR Clinic, where relaxation meets rejuvenation! Our superstar guest is receiving expert care for acne-prone skin and rough feet in a serene atmosphere. Our skilled doctors will work their magic, providing personalized attention to detail and soothing care. Customize her look with various hairstyles, makeup looks, and shoes to create a stunning outfit that's uniquely hers. Unwind and express your creativity in this calming and fashionable game.
games.shortDesc: Welcome to ASMR Clinic, where relaxation meets rejuvenation! Our superstar guest is receiving expert care for acne-prone skin and rough feet in a serene atmosphere.
games.controls: Use MOUSE to play the game.

games.title: Guess The Italian Brainrot Animals
games.description: Get ready for a wild and hilarious ride with Guess the Italian Brainrot Animals, a fast-paced, emoji-fueled trivia game that tests your knowledge of 64 iconic Italian Brainrot characters! From the most famous to the obscure, this game challenges you to guess the correct character based on three emoji clues before the timer runs out. Think you're a Brainrot expert? Prove it!
games.shortDesc: Get ready for a wild and hilarious ride with Guess the Italian Brainrot Animals, a fast-paced, emoji-fueled trivia game that tests your knowledge of 64 iconic Italian Brainrot characters! From the most famous to the obscure, this game challenges you to guess the correct character based on three emoji clues before the timer runs out.
games.controls: How to Play Guess the Italian Brainrot Animals? Mouse/Touch: Click or tap to select your answer. Keyboard Shortcuts: Use W, A, or D to quickly choose from the three options. 2 Player Mode: Player 1: W, A, D keys. Player 2: Right, Left, Up arrow keys.

games.title: Block Pixels
games.description: Block Pixels is a vibrant puzzle game where classic block-clearing action meets the creative joy of pixel art discovery. Your main goal is to strategically place colorful pieces to clear lines on the board. But the real magic lies in what you clear. Each block you eliminate contributes to a larger masterpiece. Clearing specific colors helps you build and reveal dozens of charming hidden images, from cute animals to fun objects.
games.shortDesc: Block Pixels is a vibrant puzzle game where classic block-clearing action meets the creative joy of pixel art discovery.
games.controls: Drag the colorful blocks onto the grid to complete lines and clear them from the board. Collect the specific colors needed to reveal the hidden pixel image for a huge bonus!

games.title: Geometry Platformer
games.description: Geometry Platformer is a fast-paced, reflex-testing platformer where players guide a shape-shifting cube through a series of dangerous geometric obstacles. The game features sharp spikes, swinging hazards, and gravity-defying mechanics that challenge your timing and precision. The neon graphics and intense gameplay create a thrilling experience, requiring quick reactions and memorization of complex patterns.
games.shortDesc: Geometry Platformer is a fast-paced, reflex-testing platformer where players guide a shape-shifting cube through a series of dangerous geometric obstacles.
games.controls: WASD - Move Space - Jump

games.title: Traffic Cop 3D
games.description: Traffic Cop 3D is a casual game where you play as a police officer enforcing the law of the road. Scan nearby drivers and use intel from the police database to decide whether you should pull them over, or let them go, all while progressing through the story and increasing your duties as a cop.
games.shortDesc: Traffic Cop 3D is a casual game where you play as a police officer enforcing the law of the road.
games.controls: Use the left mouse button on desktop or touch on mobile to play the game.

games.title: World Solitaire -Tripeaks-
games.description: It is TriPeaks, one of the most famous solitaires in the world. Take a step to go up and test your brain and luck How far can I clean it?
games.shortDesc: It is TriPeaks, one of the most famous solitaires in the world.
games.controls: TriPeaks Solitaire is a puzzle card game where cards are arranged in a pyramid shape on the table. You remove cards one by one by selecting cards that are one rank higher or lower than the card from the deck. Suit and color don't matter. If no moves are available, draw a new card from the deck. Consecutive removals earn bonus points, and you win by clearing all cards from the table.

games.title: RiddleMath
games.description: Math Riddles level up your IQ with a mix of logical puzzles. Challenge yourself with different levels of math games and stretch the limits of your mind. Brain games are prepared with an approach of an IQ test.
games.shortDesc: Math Riddles level up your IQ with a mix of logical puzzles.
games.controls: For Pc - Use your mouse to click on any of the available numbers. Once selected, click on an empty spot in the puzzle to place the number there. For Mobile - Drag the number from the available list and drop it into the empty space.

games.title: Alphabet Lore Maze
games.description: Alphabet Maze: Escape Letters is an exciting puzzle game that will help develop the struggle of minds and learn the letters of the alphabet. In this educational game you will explore the maze, defeating monsters, teddy bear and letter creatures. Choose characters from the collection that include Huggy, Teddy Bear, Harry and many other unique characters. To get out of the maze, you need to choose rooms with a smaller number than yours and avoid monsters larger than your level.
games.shortDesc: Alphabet Maze: Escape Letters is an exciting puzzle game that will help develop the struggle of minds and learn the letters of the alphabet.
games.controls: PC Control: Arrows/WASD Control on a mobile device: Swipe - Move between rooms - Choose a room with a smaller room than yours - Avoid enemies bigger than your level - Move on and defeat the last monster

note: Added 10 new GameDistribution games from EMBED.md entries 11-20
